description.value: This suit features separate rooms, which come fully furnished, with its own refresher station. When a creature completes a long rest involving this suite, they regain all spent Hit Dice, instead of only half of them, and their exhaustion level is reduced by 2, instead of only 1. This suite features a number of private quarters equal to half the ship's suite capacity by size, as shown in the @JournalEntry[Mnvw9iBw8gxgfCXw]{Starship Size Suite Capacity} table.
